title: Bug 126109Integrate with JDT new java class wizard for BIRT event handler creation
description: Bug 126109Integrate with JDT new java class wizard for BIRT event handler creation
EB: Currently to implement a report item event handler, you need to manually create a java class, and have the java calss to implement the event handler interface that is appropriate for that report item.We should automate this process to invoke the java new class wizard, and have the right event handler interface specified for the new event hanlder class.
